project_description: Overview:SSB Royale is a project by Sree Sai Balaji Developers located in Hosa Road, Bangalore offering aesthetically designed and spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently under construction and consists of 96 units spanned over 2 towers. SSB Royale price rate starts from Rs. 35.3 Lac onward.Project Details:SSB Royale is an ongoing project by Sree Sai Balaji Developers thoughtfully located in Hosa Road, Bangalore offering spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SSB Royale plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1016 sq. ft. to 1226 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range approx. 1260 sq. ft. SSB Royale development has a striking architecture of 96 units designed with rich features where the homes have ample natural light, scenic view and are well ventilated.SSB Royale apartments are designed with high quality interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, branded CP fittings & sanitary ware, and high quality fixtures etc.SSB Royale provides many amenities and facilities for its residents such as swimming pool, lift, 24*7 security facilities, reserved parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, kids play area, rain water harvesting, water storage, vaastu compliant etc. and various others.Highpoints:SSB Royale is a stylish residential project nestled on Hosa Road, Bangalore. The project has well planned and BBMP approved apartments with quality features and lavish apartments. SSB Royale locality is situated parallel to Hosur Main Road and 5 km from Silk Board, 2 km from PES School of Engineering, 4 km from Narayana Hrudayala Hospital, 3 km from Electronic City and 12 km from Vidhana Soudha. Civic utilities in the vicinity include various schools, hospitals, bus stop, shopping mall, pharmacy, grocery stores etc.

about_project_details: HM Constructions was established in the year 1991 as a private residential and commercial developer in Bangalore, India. Today, ISO 9001 certified HM constructions is a flagship company of the HM group, one of Bangalores largest real estate companies in terms of revenue, earning, market capitalization and development potential areas. It is firmly entrenched in commercial and residential sectors through the building of viable business spaces and quality homes, using the choicest materials in prime locations of the city. HM Constructions is committed to being the most preferred and trusted service provider in the real estate space, through the delivery of promised quality in the most preferred locations at an excellent value.The largest entertainment brand in India, Amoeba launched by HM Leisure and Entertainment, a division of HM Group has become the largest operator of bowling alleys, family entertainment centers and redemption machines in Bangalore, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Ahmedabad, Indore and other Indian cities. HM has also built its reputation of interior design, with its brand Shop Design, which cohesively mingled architecture, interior designing and town planning by renowned professionals in their own fields to bring creative solution both nationally and internationally. HM Hospitality, another successful division of the HM Group has carved an enviable niche for itself by operating a chain of restaurants and service apartments conforming to the highest international quality standards.HM Constructions commitment to maintain total customer satisfaction has made it one of Bangalores most reputed property developers with completed, ongoing and upcoming projects in some of the prime locations in the city. HM aims at providing complete property management solutions with a well-trained team. HM offers a wide spectrum of choice for modern-day families, all driven by futuristic functionality and affordability.

project_description: Emerson Park gated community project is located in Whitefield, just off the Whitefield-Sai Baba Ashram road. We chose Whitefield because it is a quiet, exclusive residential area with schools, malls, healthcare facilities, software parks, and places of business – all within a 10-15 minute drive.Emerson Park has been designed to define old-world charm in a modern luxurious environment. Our small community concept promotes easier living, greater harmony and peace of mind while retaining exclusivity thus making it a great place to raise your children. The low population density ensures that residents get a sense of privacy even while sharing the swimming pool and the club house facilities. Cobbled one-way interior driveways that require cars to drive slowly add to the safe and practical allure of our residential offerings. 34 homes have been laid out in two blocks making optimal use of the area. The living spaces are located on a mezzanine level, 8 feet above the road guaranteeing complete privacy from pedestrian and vehicular traffic. Each home includes 2 private covered parking spots on the ground level.Openness is an important aspect of our design and we incorporate skylights and windows to provide ambient light and cross-ventilation. Living rooms come with 12 ft high ceilings and small landscaped spaces that bring nature indoors and provide residents with mini green courts. We are proud to share that Emerson Park is Vaastu compliant without compromising the modern design or practical nature of our homes.
about_project_details: Wood shire Developers LLP is a Bangalore-based real estate development company. Brought together by a shared vision, the company is promoted by a group of like-minded individuals with decades of global and local experience in real estate development, commodity export and other diverse fields of business.The vision of Wood shire Developers is simple to provide clients with luxury homes that offer the best possible value in terms of investment, location and exclusivity. Our design philosophy embraces the construction of stylized homes with old world charm

project_description: VS Sai Ashraya is a project by VSR Ventures located in Whitefield, Bengaluru offering lavishly designed ready to move 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments.  It consists of 154 units spanned over 2 towers. VS Sai Ashraya price rate starts from Rs. 48 Lac onward. VS Sai Ashraya is fully equipped with amenities and also in close vicinity to various civic utilities.Project Details:VS Sai Ashraya located in Whitefield, Bengaluru, is a project by VSR Ventures offering spacious ready to move 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. VS Sai Ashraya plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 975 sq. ft. to 1265 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1345 sq. ft. to 1695 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2400 sq. ft. to 3000 sq. ft.VS Sai Ashraya apartments are being designed with polished vitrified tiles in all rooms, anti skid ceramic tiles in the toilet, teak wood frame door, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen platform etc.VS Sai Ashraya is a RERA Certified Project. VS Sai Ashraya also provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like power backup, swimming pool, security, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, rain water harvesting etc. and many more.Highpoints:VS Sai Ashraya also has a special lifestyle amenity like jogging & strolling track for its residents. It is well located and in close proximity of 2 km from State Bank of India, 2.7 km from Goods Loading Terminal and 4.8 km from Alembic Glass Colony. Utilities like Sai Garden bus stop, KIADB Shopping Complex, Chrysalis High Kadugodi, Whitefield station, New Life Hospital, Canara Bank ATM, Grand Supermarket, etc. also lie in the vicinity.

project_description: Alpine Viva is a stunning residential project developed by Alpine Housing. Located in the well-known IT hub of Whitefield, Bangalore – this gorgeous piece of residence is projected across whopping 6.5 acres of vibrant greenery. The project offers 2, 3 & 4 bedrooms flats with varying area size measuring from 1239 – 2495 sqft. The flat rates of Alpine Viva Whitefield, Bangalore are reasonably priced starting from Rs. 58 Lacs onwards. Project details Featuring 4 glorious high-rise towers, this residential project offers 432 elegant homes to choose from. Robustly constructed, these RCC framed structures are earthquake resistant build with solid concrete blocks. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Alpine Viva are thoughtfully constructed with anti-skid tiles in all the bathrooms and fancy vitrified flooring across rest of the homes. Beautiful teakwood doors, huge windows, large balconies and spacious kitchen rooms are some of the impressive features of these abodes which make them worth buying. Applauded with good reviews, Alpine Viva 2BHK apartments are available for both sale & rent. The project is loaded with numerous recreational & entertainment amenities like aerobic, gym, Jacuzzi, indoor swimming pool, party hall, sauna, kids play area, indoor games and much more. Highpoints The handpicked location is indeed one of the strong advantage of this RERA certified residential project which make it desirable. Several well-known IT companies like Wipro, Infosys, TCS, etc., are located in Whitefield and are easily accessible from this residence. The famous Narayana Multispeciality Hospital and the prestigious The Bangalore School are situated within just 5km radius. Reliable connectivity to public transport facilities, Outer Ring Road (ORR), ITPL Main Road and Old Airport Road make this area a favourable residential destination. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Alpine Viva Whitefield, Bangalore and experience a beautiful life with your near & dear ones.

project_description: Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is a project by Total Environment located in Whitefield, Bengaluru offering luxuriously designed currently under construction 3 BHK, 3.5 BHK, 4 BHK and 5 BHK villa and apartments consisting of 799 units spanned over 34 acres of total project area. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody price rate starts at Rs. 2.3 Cr onward.Project Details:Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody located in Whitefield, Bengaluru is a project by Total Environment offering spacious currently under construction 3 BHK, 3.5 BHK, 4 BHK and 5 BHK villa and apartments. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody plot areas for its 3 BHK flat ranges from 2561 sq. ft. to 4154 sq. ft.; 3.5 BHK flat areas range is approx. 3745 sq. ft.; 4 BHK flat areas range 4951 sq. ft. to 6295 sq. ft. and 5 BHK villa range is approx. 4786 sq. ft.The project has designed the apartments with high quality interiors as well as exteriors. It is designed in a close feel to nature, giving the residents green scenery and a quite environment.Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is a RERA Certified Project. Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is also integrated with numerous amenities like amphitheatre, children’s play area, landscaped garden, sewage treatment, swimming pool, badminton court, jogging track, lift, spa, tennis court, gym, restaurant, squash court and yoga area.Highpoints:Pursuit of a Radical Rhapsody is located in the amazing neighbourhood of Whitefield. Special amenities of the project include heated pool with outdoor infinity pool, a dance room, guest suites for visitors, indoor games zone, central community space, long term maintenance, sky walk and retail centres within the premises. The project has excellent connectivity to major MNC’s like Hindustan Unilever, Britannia, HP, Cap Gemini, Tata Elxsi, ITPL, Bhoruka Tech Park and many more.
about_project_details: Total Environment is an architect-led real estate design and development firm, with projects that range from residential apartments to corporate campuses.Our vision is to provide an unsurpassed living experience through the creation of sensitively designed spaces.We build completely furnished and individually customized spaces with a focus on good design and sensitive detailing.Our design philosophy is about creating physical environments that are in harmony with their surroundings. Our distinctiveness lies in strong attention to detail, and contemporary design that makes living a joyous experience.We have successfully addressed the real-estate requirements of the new, global citizen.Our strength is the ability to understand and meet their needs through innovative concepts, transparency and personalized service.We combine our expertise with cutting edge technology and an out of the box Approach to make living More comfortable, productive and joyous.Our customers have found in us a partner who in a complete departure from the traditionally negative industry perception, seeks to make the whole experience as warm and personal as the homes we deliver.

VBHC Value Homes Private Limited (formerly known as Value and Budget Housing Corporation Private Limited) was founded and incorporated in July 2008 by former Chairman of Mphasis, Mr. Jaithirth (Jerry) Rao and former Consumer Banking Head of Citibank Mr. P. S. Jayakumar.

An amalgamation of people with rich and vast corporate experience from diverse backgrounds, VBHC believes that good quality living should be within everyone’s reach and grasp. Landmark projects in Mumbai, NCR, Bengaluru and Chennai are testimony to this belief. Recently, we opened an international office in Dubai to serve customers across the Middle East and other parts of the world.

VBHC applies contemporary building technology, computer-aided design methods, a lean manufacturing process and ingenious industrial engineering processes to deliver affordable housing. Exceptional quality of construction, a transparent buying experience, speedy completion and delivery at low cost forms the hallmark of VBHC.

With prestigious investors, such as, HDFC, IFC, Carlyle, Van Herk Groep, Daiwa Group, and Caspian Advisers, VBHC has large-scale expansion plans, and promises to deliver 18,000 homes in the next few years as the company expands its footprint across India

project_description: Located in Whitefield Bangalore Thousand Lights is township that enhances the concept of community living. The township is spread in a wide expanse of land covered with greenery that provides refreshment to the body and mind. Thousand lights by Northgate properties is the epitome of modern urban living with its world class amenities. The exterior of the residential township of Thousand lights is sturdy while the interiors are well designed conducive for modern living. Thousand lights offers an opportunity to lead a nature friendly lifestyle surrounded by natural beauty. This concept of nature friendliness has been enhanced by the use of methods like rain water harvesting which replenish the ground water.The best part about Thousand Lights is that it is located within minutes of a hospital and school while the railway station and airport are also close by. Among the amenities provided within the township there is a banquet hall for parties and social gatherings and a separate kids play area where the little ones can play. The apartments of Thousand Lights are Vaastu compliant and as we know, Vaastu is fast becoming popular as a way of enhancing the well being and happiness in your life. There is a park where you can take refreshing morning walks and leisurely evening strolls.
about_project_details: THOUSAND LIGHTS is promoted and developed by NORTHGATE PROPERTIES a firm with an impeccable reputation for quality, integrity and on schedule delivery. For us, it is not just a business, but also a pleasure to delight and deliver the dreams of our customers. And our commitment does not end there and shines us.

It is quick enroute to International Airport.Sohum ISIRI offers 45 Beautiful 2 & 3 deluxe bedroom homes in G + 4 floors. Close to Shopping Malls, Schools, Hospitals, etc., Sohum ISIRI paves the way to the brighter side of your lifestyles.
about_project_details: Sohum is the sound of pulsating energy that is evident in the very breath of every living form; of inhalation (Sooo) and exhalation (Huum). This Sanskrit word, which means 'I am Him', is the affirmation of the supreme energy within us through every breath we take. When chanted, it aligns the mind and soul, providing inner strength. This universal energy is symbolised in the form of a mandala representing both inward and outward energy, much like the inhalation and exhalation of breath that rouses the power of Sohum.As a group our objective is to improve the quality of life by providing world-class infrastructure and homes that will keep you happy for a lifetime. We intend to provide the power of positive energy for the entire community through our architecture and design.

project_description: Sowparnika Sanvi is one of an authentic residential project spanning over 4.0 acres of land launched by Sowparnika Projects is brilliantly located at an iconic location of Whitefield, Bangalore. The whole project is surrounded by lush greenery; the stunning eye-catching views along with open spaces will make this heartwarming and pleasing project unbeatable.Project detailsThe project comprises of well-ventilated 216 units alienated into 5 floors. It offers spacious and thoughtfully designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments which are designed as per traditional vaastu norms. The floor plan of this project is commendable as the 2 BHK units are spread across a super built-up area of 1075 to 1449 sqft whereas the 3 BHK unit covers an area of 1156 to 1556 sqft. These faultlessly built units are up for rent.Sowparnika Sanvi is well equipped with all the basic amenities to facilitate the needs of the residents. The project is legally approved by BBMP and is registered under RERA act which is an extra privilege.   HighpointsSowparnika Sanvi is centrally located in Whitefield which is an IT hub located in the eastern quadrant of Bangalore. The presence of educational institutions, healthcare centers and essential civic utilities have favored the address of this project. The locality is convenient for many reasons like market, transport, restaurant and medical stores, all these are accessible within a stone throw distance. It is also well connected to Forum Value Mall within 0.5 km, ITPL, EPIP are all accessible within 2 km radius.According to the project reviews this is one of the unsurpassed projects is Whitefield. If you have been planning to invest in your dream home, then this may just be the opening you have been searching for. What's stopping you, book a flat right now and enjoy the rest of your life.

project_description: Walk into the environs of aristocratic living and feel like a pampered guest in your own home. Esperanza Towers is designed to look and feel elite and exclusive – wide open spaces with lush, blossoming greenery and the distinctive privileges and conveniences of a posh country club.The first phase of Esperanza Towers stands as a magnificent piece of architecture. The second phase of Esperanza Towers equals the allure and magic of the first. It comes with exceptional amenities, attention to the tiniest detail of comfort and convenience, thoughtfully-planned apartment layouts and a grand view of nature.Esperanza is spread over 7.5 acres. Esperanza Phase I comprises of 98 apartments and 12 Row Houses.Esperanza Phase II Towers are a modern day marvel of eco-living perfectly blended into the urban landscape, with elegantly crafted homes designed to give you best of space and lifestyle. It comprises of 190 Apartments, 12 Row Houses and 10 Town Houses. It uses intelligent Euro Design concepts that keep in mind Indian sensibilities at all levels from groundwork to design and elevations. The Studio and Single Bedroom Units range from 530-940 sqft. & Two, Three and Four Bedroom Units range from 1175-4075 sqft.

project_description: Isha Misty Green is a unique residential project positioned in S G Whitefield, Bangalore. Offered housing options at Isha Misty Green consist of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments of different dimensions. The homes available in this project do not share common walls resulting in utmost privacy. Project details The project comprises of world class architectural design, superior technology and all the amenities for luxury living. Every section of house is properly ventilated and gives enough natural light. Isha Misty Green includes 560 units divided into 11 towers and the rates of this project ranges between Rs. 49.9 Lakhs to Rs. 55.0 Lakhs. This RERA registered project offers 2 BHK apartment spread across 1227 to 1403 sqft as well as 3 BHK which covers an area of 1436 to 1844 sqft. Isha Misty Green includes a wide range of comfy and coveted features that cooperatively along with a great site guarantee a tranquil living. Children will enjoy in specialized and totally safe play area and various gaming facilities included here. Security is one of the biggest concerns while purchasing a new property. This venture has hi-tech safety provisions. Highpoints The aesthetic design and vibrant atmosphere makes this project ideal place for recreation and peace of mind. The address of this project that is in Whitefield Bangalore is the main highlight. Residents here will unquestionably get quick access to finer utilities like colleges, hospitals, shopping areas, recreational areas, public gardens and several public facilities. Apart from this, Whitefield Railway Station, Forum Value Mall, ITPL, Vydehi Hospital, Q Cinemas, upcoming metro station and many other facilities are accessible within few minutes. At Isha Misty Green elegantly Built, innovatively structured and spaciously planned living spaces are ready for possession hence book a flat now as per your ease and preference.

project_description: DSR Green Fields invites you to experience a unique and exciting lifestyle. The power of two forces, technology and environment make up DSR Green Fields. Located in Whitefield, one of Bangalore finest locality, your home will be in close proximity to the ITPB where most IT companies have set up offices. As such, it will serve as an intelligent abode for the networked society.
about_project_details: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards. With diversified businesses interests across many portfolios DSR today has achieved staggering successes, thanks to its partners, associates and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. project_description: OverviewSobha Avenue is a famous residential project by Sobha Ltd located in Whitefield, Bangalore.  This wonderful project is spread across 2.97 acres comprising of well designed 175 units distributed in one tower. Sobha Avenue floor plan boasts elegantly crafted 3BHK flats covering an area of 1099 sqft to 1865 sqft. Project detailsThis project is still under construction and possession will be give by Dec 2018. Sobha Avenue reviews and images provide a perfect picture that this project is a unique combination of luxury and comfort. Moreover, Sobha Avenue address is a one stop address for all the home seekers. Sobha Avenue price list  ranges between Rs. 80.8 Lac to 1.20 Crore.These airy, spacious and bright apartments of Sobha Avenue are bordered by IT Hubs, International school and malls. This project offers variety of modern amenities like club house, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool and kids play area. Moreover, covered car parking is available at basement and visitor’s car parking is provided at ground level. Luxurious amenities, great connectivity and incredible look and feel altogether make it a delightful place to live in. Apart from this, there are various Sobha upcoming projects in Whitefield. HighpointsSobha Ltd project include residential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and homes that are well equipped with rich amenities.Close proximity to Kannamangala Gate Bus Stop, Thirumala Lakshmi Grand and Thirumala Vaibhav Appartment Complex, Five Star Chicken, Safal Daily Fresh Regional Center Of Organic Farming, ICICI Bank ATM and Aegis Medicare make this project an ideal residential destination.Within 5km radius, there are well established schools like Chrysalis High Kadugodi, Just4Kids Play School, EuroKids, Kidzee Kadugodi and Government Lower Primary School.Book now and experience a luxurious life in this gorgeous Sobha Avenue,Whitefield, Bangalore.
about_project_details: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

project_description: Overview: Habitat Eden Heights is a project by Habitat Ventures Private Limited located in Whitefield, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. The project is ready for possession and consists of 314 units spanned over 4 towers. Habitat Eden Heights price rate start from Rs. 85.9 Lac onward.Project Details:Habitat Eden Heights is a ready to move residential project situated in Whitefield, Bangalore by Habitat Ventures Private Limited offering lavish and thoughtfully designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. Habitat Eden Heights plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1354 sq. ft. to 1447 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1768 sq. ft. to 2021 sq. ft.Habitat Eden Heights apartment are designed with specifications like water proof terrace and toilet, vitrified tiles and anti skid tiles flooring, hardwood frame doors, concealed electrical wiring with modular switches, concealed plumbing with quality sanitary ware, branded fixtures etc.Habitat Eden Heights has numerous amenities for its residents like a club house, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security, visitor parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, piped gas, rain water harvesting, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.Highpoints:Habitat Eden Heights is situated in the heart of the IT hub of eastern part of Bangalore. Habitat Eden Heights locality is one of the most popular neighbourhoods and also has close connectivity to the rest of the city. Several basic civic utilities like Hoodi Bus Stop, Gopalan National School, Phoenix Marketcity, Telerad RxDx Healthcare Whitefield, Syndicate Bank ATM, Big Bazaar, The Zuri Whitefield, PVR Cinema, Hexa Innovation Park, Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. all lie in close vicinity of the project.

project_description: Overview Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield, Bangalore is an impressive residential project by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited. Located just a stone’s throw from all the prime necessities, this residential society spread across 4-acres of blooming greenery offers 392 well-designed units spread among 6 towers. Furthermore, filled with lots of fresh air & natural light, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield welcome you to breathe a new life and live in contentment. Soak in the serene atmosphere of this society and unwind yourself from all the stress of life. To usher an active life, this residential project offers a bunch of world-class sporting & other recreational amenities like jogging track, amphitheatre, party lawn, well-equipped gym, swimming pool, meditation hall, aerobics room, tennis courts, etc. This is a safe and secured gated community with CCTVs installed across all the towers. Highpoints Convenient location is the prime factor which make Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield is preferred residential place. Forum Value Mall, Hope Farms and Satya Sai Hospital are the famous landmarks to this residence. VIBGYOR High, DPS and Whitefield Global are some of the prominent schools found within close proximity. This stunning residential project also offers good connectivity to public transport facilities. Whitefield also enjoys good proximity to major IT companies/parks like CapGemini, KIADB, HP, ITPL and KIADB to name a few.

project_description: Sumadhura Silver Ripples is an excellent project urbanized by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited centrally located in Whitefield, Bangalore. Sumadhura Silver Ripples comprises of 9 attentively designed towers consisting of entirely 474 units. 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK units are decently priced at a range of Rs.97.4 Lakhs to 1.19 Crore which is exceptionally a reasonable price.About the ProjectAll the units of Sumadhura Silver Ripples enjoy flawless ventilation and the quality of construction is definitely up to the expected mark. 2BHK units consist of 1/2 balconies and 2 bathrooms, spread across a spacious area of 945 to 1585sq.ft where as the area of 3BHK flats range between 1560 to 2150sq.ft comprising of 1/2/3 balconies as well as 2/3 bathrooms. 4BHK flats are available with 2/3 balconies along with 4 bathrooms and the area varies between 2035 to 2185sq.ft. Overall these flats are utterly pleasing to the eye of the buyers.The project ensures that the residents are benefited with all the facilities hence it includes most of the world class amenities such as banquet hall, cafeteria/food court, meditation area, indoor squash & badminton courts and aerobics room. Furthermore, Sumadhura Silver Ripples is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, ICICI, LIC Housing Finance and SBI which is an added advantage.HighpointsSumadhura Silver Ripples enjoys tremendous connectivity to all the major places in Bangalore city as the project is centrally located in Whitefield which is a prominent IT hub. Another outstanding highpoint is that, most of the renowned schools, hospitals, restaurants and Tech Park such as Gopalan National School, Sai Baba Hospital, Keys Hotel and ITPL are all accessible at a distance of only 1.5 to 3.5Km. Book a flat in Sumadhura Silver Ripples right now and enjoy all the admirable facilities.

project_description: Overview:Desai Radiant is a project by Desai Developers located in Whitefield, Bangalore offering lavish and skilfully designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Desai Radiant is currently under construction and consists of 130 units spanned over 2 towers. The development is going to grace the Bangalore skyline with 13 stories and a scenic 360 degree view of the city.Project Details:Desai Radiant is a strategically placed residential project in the prime location of Whitefield, Bangalore. It offers skilfully crafted 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Desai Radiant plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1085 sq. ft. to 1145 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1415 sq. ft. to 1735 sq. ft. Desai Radiant apartments are being designed with RCC frame structure, vitrified tiles flooring, wooden laminated flooring in master bedroom, fire resistant electrical wires with elegant designer modular switches, concealed plumbing, green granite kitchen platform with SS sink, and teak wood frame doors etc.Desai Radiant will provide amenities like jogging track, security, lift, park, reserved parking, swimming pool, visitor parking, intercom facility, dance studio, club house, rain water harvesting, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, and fire fighting equipment etc. and various others.Highpoints:Desai Radiant is strategically located centrally off Whitefield Main Road. Desai Radiant locality is just 0.05 km from Whitefield Railway Station, 4 km from ITPL, 5 km from Sathya Sai Hospital, 3 km from Hoodi Circle, 4 km from Phoneix Mall and 3 km from Forum Value Mall. The project is bringing new aspects in luxurious living with its artistic and aesthetic infrastructure. The vicinity includes KIADB Shopping Complex, The Deen's Academy, Ambedkar Nagar Bus Stop, Reliance Fresh, ICICI Bank ATM, Avenue Pharma, Chaithanya Health Park, Bharat Petroleum Pump, and Power House Gym etc.

project_description: DSR Sunrise Towers is a ready to move residential project by DSR Infrastructure. This prestigious project is located at Whitefield, Bangalore with 228 Units in 4 Towers offering 3 BHK Apartments with excellent amenities. Positioned at Whitefield, Bengaluru, it fully lives up to all your expectations. The strength of this upscale residential project lies in its affordability and practicality.Project Details:The strategy and aesthetic appeal of the 3 BHK Apartments are matchless. The project comprises of 228 units of 4 towers in total. The price for this project varies from Rs 82 lakhs to 1.10 cr. The warm ambience and attention to detail inside and the lively and pleasant ambience outdoors is what draws buyers to it. With almost 75% of open spaces at DSR Sunrise Towers, it is a vast expanse of area giving its residents a refreshing living experience. DSR Sunrise Towers is a RERA Certified Project.Special Amenities of this project are Club House, Jogging and Strolling Track, Cycling & Jogging Track, Barbeque Pit, Dance Studio, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift, Security, Park, Reserved Parking, Visitor Parking, Intercom Facility, Maintenance Staff, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, DTH Television Facility, Flower Gardens, Rain Water Harvesting, Retail Boulevard (Retail Shops), Water Storage, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Multipurpose Courts, Meditation Area, Waste Disposal, Fire Fighting. So if this is what your idea of an ideal abode for your family is then do not waste any more time but give us a call today.Highpoints The project is located very close to Sathya Sai General Hospital which is just 2.1 km away. Whitefield Global School is present at just 0.3 km from DSR Sunrise Towers including Namdhari's Fresh which is 1.8 km away. Unique features offered by the project are Lush and green surroundings. The project is an affordable option for the buyers.
about_project_details: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards. With diversified businesses interests across many portfolios DSR today has achieved staggering successes, thanks to its partners, associates and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential to investment. All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavour of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

project_description: Overview Assetz Marq in Whitefield, Bangalore is a prominent residential project spread across 22-acre enclave featuring 4 signature towers housing around 469 units. The price range for the apartments vary between Rs.59.8lakhs and Rs.96.3lakhs for residential apartments in the configuration of 2BHK and 3BHK. About the Project This thoughtfully designed project, situated in the prime location of Whitefield is revolutionary in many aspects as it aims to provide every conceivable convenience within the premises. Each floor only has 4 apartments, which means every apartment receives plenty of natural light and fresh air and privacy is also maintained. Super built up area for a 2BHK unit is around 1277sq.ft. while 3BHK super built up area is around 1041sq.ft. and 1101sq.ft. Assetz Marq has been designed in a manner to provide a comprehensive lifestyle where the aim is to ensure residents are able sit back and relax and literally not worry about a thing in their little private haven. The well ventilated residential apartments along with a suite of exclusive amenities is a testimony to the luxury and comfort this project provides. Top-notch facilities are provided such as clubhouse, infinity pool, indoor badminton court, party hall, gym, multipurpose sports facilities, indoor games and courtyard. Every minute detail in this project has been given due consideration to ensure only the highest quality standards are met. Highpoints behind Assetz Marq has been intelligently planned by the award-winning master planner Ross Bonthorne from Australia. He has ensured that every apartment is equipped with fibre-to-the-home technology. This project also boasts 5 acres of retail Town Center. Whitefield is a prime location boasting connectivity to Old Madras Road and city center. Location, technological advancement and green surroundings are just few of the reasons on why booking an apartment in Assetz Marq is a wisest decision one can make.
about_project_details: Founded in 2006, Assetz Property Group is a front-runner among multinational developers in India with over 10 million square feet under development. Assetz, headquartered in Singapore, is a multi-faceted real estate development and asset management company with four business verticals: Commercial, Residential, Warehousing and Fund Management.Assetz has built two world-class IT tech parks in Bangalore: Vrindavan Tech Village (now Embassy Tech Village) - Indias first Platinum LEED certified IT SEZ, and Global Technology Park. And, its residential portfolio includes ten projects in prominent locations across Bangalore.

project_description: Sumadhura Pranavam is not only the most adorable project in the Whitefield of Bangalore, but also the most affordable project which matches your budget. Developed by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited, this project boasts a number of facilities and the price list is starting from Rs.61.3 Lakhs - Rs.10.20 Crore.Project detailsElegant Sumadhura Pranavam in Whitefield offers 2 and 3 BHK apartments that provide the perfect experience of the art of fine living. The built-up area ranges between 1150 to 1880 sqft. Spread across 2.2 acres, Sumadhura Pranavam has a total number of 3 blocks and there are a whole of 198 units. The 2 BHK flat is spread across 1136 to 1248 sqft area with 1/2 balconies and 2 bathrooms. The area of 3BHK flat ranges between 1605 to 1880 sqft with 2 balconies and 3 bathrooms.The artistically and perfectly planned layout of the project is designed by the best architects and moreover this luxurious project is made according to the vaastu principles for positive feelings. The major amenities in the project include multipurpose hall, multipurpose courts, aerobics room and kid's play pool with water slides. Sumadhura Pranavam offers ongoing properties and is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks and is also RERA Certified.HighpointsSumadhura Pranavam in Whitefield is hardly few meters away from major Corporates, Tech parks and hubs. These apartments are sought after due to their location advantage.  Everything is in close proximity, be it schools, educational institutes, malls, top restaurants and hospitals.The apartments offered here integrate aesthetic design values with modern technology. This has resulted in some of the finest, luxurious yet affordable living spaces that residents simply love to be a part of. If this is what you had been waiting for, then immediately check for the availability and book one.

project_description: OverviewOrchid Whitefield launched by Goyal & Co Hariyana Group is situated in Whitefield, Bangalore. This project comprises of 492 residential flats spread over 5 splendid towers. Orchid Whitefield flats price lie within Rs.50.6 Lac - 1.02 Cr.About the projectOrchid Whitefield reviews and photos will give you a clear view why this society is worth consideration. Goyal Orchid Whitefield Floor Plan offers spacious 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments. Spanning across 7 acres of area, this project is designed by the well known architects. Orchid Whitefield 2BHK  flats are spread across 750 sqft to 1350 sqft and are budgeted within Rs. 50.6 lakhs to 87.4 lakhs. Orchid Whitefield 3BHK apartments are covering 1520 sqft to 1610 sqft and are priced within 97.2 lakhs to 1.02 crore.  For a detailed description of this project, have a look at Orchid Whitefield Ahmedabad Brochure. This project offers you various kind of amenities and will make you live your  life to the fullest. Some of the amenities offered include club house, swimming pool, kids play area and internet,WiFi connectivity.This project is located in a highly eco friendly area as almost 80 Percentage landscaped area is available in this project. Also, the occupant can have a good time at the gardens that are available with WIFI facility. Moreover, there is a built-in sports complex that features multiples games exclusively meant for residents. Highpoints This project enjoys close connectivity to Ramagondanahalli Bus Stop, Cosmos Mall, VIBGYOR High School, Sankara Eye Hospital, Bank of India ATM, Maha Ganapathi Temple, Reliance Fresh and  Hexa Innovation, Neolife Yoga Studio and Avenue Pharma,. To enrich your taste buds you can have a quality times with your dear ones at Marriott Hotel Whitefield. Moreover, it is also has access to various means of public transport.Walk in and book a flat now in this marvelous Orchid Whitefield.
about_project_details: Goyal and Co is a part of the larger conglomerate Hariyana Group which is into diversified businesses like Shipping, Industrial Gases, Real Estate and Steel Trading. The Real Estate wing of Hariyana Group operates under the brand name Goyal and Co with Orchid being the first name of many of their projects. Goyal and Co has been creating landmark projects for more than 4 decades making it one of the oldest builders in India. Goyal and Co has footprint in Ahemadabad, Mumbai, Bangalore and slowly spreading to other locations in India. Goyal and co has been delivering quality projects in Bangalore since last few years. Primarily having a strong foot in North Bangalore which is the future of Bangalore. To name a few Orchid Woods Hennur Road, Orchid Footprint - Thanisandra, Orchid Nirvana - IVC Road and Allonaville - Off Hennur Road.

project_description: Overview: SBR Horizon is a project by SBR Group based in Whitefield, Bangalore offering simply designed 1 BHK, 2 BHK apartments and luxuriously designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. SBR Horizon infrastructure is currently under construction and will consist of 180 units spanned over 5 towers. SBR Horizon price rate starts from Rs. 35.8 Lac onward.Project Details:SBR Horizon is situated in Whitefield, Bangalore by SBR Group offering elegantly designed 1 BHK, 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK currently ongoing construction apartments of different dimensions. SBR Horizon plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range approx. 747 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 910 sq. ft. to 1197 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1218 sq. ft. to 1632 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range approx. 1792 sq. ft. SBR Horizon has various amenities for its residents like a club house, jogging and strolling track, swimming pool, indoor games room, kids play area, aerobics room, indoor squash & badminton courts, etc. and many more. SBR Horizon apartments have a strong earthquake resistant RCC frame structure and other interiors like teak wood frame doors, anti skid tiles and vitrified tiles flooring, concealed plumbing with high quality fittings, concealed wiring with elegant modular switches, kitchen with granite platform and SS sink, branded fixtures etc.Highpoints:SBR Horizon is designed with a contemporary look and sheer living space for its residents. The project is spread over 2 acres of the prestigious locality of Whitefield, Bangalore. SBR Horizon is close to peripheral outer ring road and 1.5 km from the railway station. Numerous basic civic utilities like Shell Petrol Bank Bus Stop, Chrysalis High, Niharika Medicals & General Stores, Canara Bank, Five Star Chicken, Belathur Park, etc. are part of the neighbourhood.

project_description: Terra Alegria is a luxurious project by M1 Homes located in Whitefield, Bangalore is offering lavishly crafted and aesthetically designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas. The project is currently under construction and will consist of 103 well planned lavish units spanned over a large acre of landscaped area. Terra Alegria price rate starts at Rs. 69 Lac onward. Project Details:Terra Alegria, an exquisite residential development located in Whitefield, Bangalore by the well experienced M1 Homes is offering lavishly crafted and aesthetically designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas. Terra Alegria plot areas for its 3 BHK villa range from 1700 sq. ft. to 2591 sq. ft. and 4 BHK villa areas range from 2330 sq. ft. to 2500 sq. ft.Terra Alegria villas are being luxuriously developed with a strong RCC frame structure and high standard features like ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in every room, decorative entrance doors and internal flush doors, concealed electrical wiring with premium quality PVC conduits, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink and tiles dado above counter, anodised aluminium sliding windows, good quality sanitary ware fittings and good quality CP fittings, throughout every villa etc. Terra Alegria Bangalore facilitates its residents with a huge landscape garden, open space with flower garden, club house, outdoor tennis courts, power back up, swimming pool, security facilities, visitor parking, intercom facility, children’s play area, rain water harvesting and kids play pool with water slides etc. including other amenities and facilities. Highpoints:Terra Alegria Bangalore locality is a prime feature as it is easily accessible to the rest of the city and has various basic civic utilities like Shanknipura Bus Stop, Madhusudhan Ramakrishnappa Farm, SLN Medical & General Store, Central Bank Of India, Government Higher Primary School, and HP Petrol Pump etc. in close proximity from the infrastructure.

project_description: OverviewGCN Brindavan is one of the well-known projects of GCN projects Pvt. Ltd. This attention-grabbing project is thoughtfully developed by GCN Group and it consists of 3 towers with only 4 floors (ground+3 floors). Offering 136 well ventilated units of 2 and 3 BHK configurations, this project is legally approved.  Located in Whitefield, Bangalore, the current status of this project is ongoing and the price list of GCN Brindavan ranges between Rs. 39.0 Lac 47.0 Lac.About the projectThe GCN group is a trustworthy name in real estate market as the GCN group review is on the positive side. GCN Brindavan floor plan offers various abodes that are spacious as well as well-ventilated. Measuring 2 acres, this well planned project offers spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments spread across an area that varies from 1045 sqft to 1225 sqft. Each apartment of this project is constructed as an independent unit hence the apartments have three side open space. Enjoying abundant natural sunlight and fresh air, the apartments of GCN Brindavan does not share common walls. The society is tucked with all the modern amenities like huge clubhouse, multipurpose hall, high-end security, park, swimming pool, badminton court, indoor games room, aerobics room, jogging and strolling track, lift, gym, kids play pool, meditation area and so on.HighpointsCentrally located in Whitefield, Bangalore, this project offers smooth connectivity to KR Puram railway station, metro station, Lake Montfort, SJES, Sea Education Trust, Amarajyothi Venkateshwara, KR Puram Super Speciality, Sairam Nursing Home and Divya Montessori. Apart from this, other well-known malls, schools, colleges, banks etc., are also easily accessible within a short distance.You can also go through the GCN Brindavan reviews and photos, which will help you to get a clear idea. Book an apartment now in GCN Brindavan as it provides an oasis of comfort, tranquility and luxury.

project_description: Bollineni Silas is a pristine and brand new residential development by the well known BSCPL Infrastructure Limited Developers at Whitefield, in the vicinity of Bangalore. The Bollineni Silas offers a choice of 2 and 3 BHK flats with vast open spaces at a budgeted price starting from Rs. 43.4 Lakhs. Bollineni Silas dwelling is carefully designed with a world class design and constructional features.Project detailsThe 499 housing units are sprawled across an area of 10 acres and the floor plan of this project comprises of 2 and 3 BHK flats which are very spacious and designed as per the latest architectural features. The possession of these flats which are spread across 1060 to 1600 sqft area is slated in December 2018.Bollineni Silas provides an extensive range of facilities to the residents like yoga and aerobics, squash court, indoor badminton court, card room, carom, table tennis, pool table, children's play area and club house. There are also provisions for the intercom, 24 x 7 security, power backup and maintenance staff. This RERA Certified project is a home that everyone dreamt to be lived in. Most importantly it provides you a space that liberates and sets you comfortable and free.HighpointsAt, Bollineni Silas you will discover the pleasure of world class living. One of the major advantages of this project is the location. You are never truly far from a hospital, school, hotel, a cinema, a mall or even any recreational centers when living in Whitefield. Also, Bollineni Silas enjoys fantastic connectivity to the surrounding MNC Companies.All these above features make this project stand apart from the regular lot of projects offered by developers. To experience beauty and perfection like never before all you have to do right now is book a flat of your choice.

project_description: DSR Lotus Towers is a project by DSR Groups, located in Whitefield, Bangalore, offering currently under construction 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 176 units spanned over 2 towers. DSR Lotus Towers price rate starts from Rs. 64.8 Lac onward. The project is strategically located and equipped with various modern amenities .Project Details:DSR Lotus Towers located in Whitefield, Bangalore, is a project by DSR Groups offering lavish, luxurious and currently under construction 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. DSR Lotus Towers plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 770 sq. ft. to 996 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1082 sq. ft. to 1232 sq. ft.DSR Lotus Towers apartments are designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified, anti skid ceramic tiles flooring in every room, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, concealed wiring with modular switches, black granite kitchen counter, CP sanitary fittings etc.DSR Lotus Towers is a RERA Certified Project. DSR Lotus Towers provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24*7 security facility, intercom facility, gym, kids play area, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, canopy walk, waste disposal, conference room, multipurpose hall, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.Highpoints:DSR Lotus Towers special amenities include large open space, grand entrance lobby, dance studio, jogging & strolling track and a club house. The project is just 500 m from Shantiniketan Commercial Block, 1.8 km Vivanta by Taj, 0.28 km from Sharada Vidya Mandir, 1.4 km from Narayana Hospital, 1.5 km from the proposed ITPL Namma Metro Station, 13.5 km from MG Road and 43.3 km from Bengaluru International Airport etc. including many others in the vicinity.
about_project_details: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential for investment.All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation, and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavor of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment, and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

project_description: Republic of Whitefield is a project by DivyaSree Developers located in Whitefield Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 15 Acre encompassing 1300 units across 13 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles 800X800, Vitirfied Tiles and Anti Skid Ceramic Tiles.  Republic of Whitefield comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has area 652 Sq-ft . 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 734 Sq-ft to 1396 Sq-ft having 1 and 2 balcony and 1 and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1397 Sq-ft to 1724 Sq-ft having 1 and 3 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in January 2014, Republic of Whitefield offers Ongoing properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, Bank of Baroda, Corporation Bank, HDFC, LIC Housing Finance and SBI.
about_project_details: DivyaSree Developers, with over three decades of glorious achievements is one of Indias leading real estate developers playing a significant role in changing the real estate landscape of South India. It is one of the most reputed urban infrastructure developers, with operations in Bangalore, Hyderabad and Chennai. Whether its an IT Park, a residential development, an Infrastructure project or a built-to-suit campus, the companys technical expertise, global exposure and project management skills, give them the edge to constantly innovate and deliver the best. DivyaSree has scaled a steep growth curve in recent years with its commercial projects spanning over 14plus million sq ft and the Company has about 6plus Million Sq.ft living spaces in various stages of development and planning catering to various needs of the contemporary India Family.

project_description: The Avenue is a project by Ezzy Group located in Whitefield Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 1 Acre encompassing 36 units across 1 towers. The floorings are made of Imported Marble Tiles, Engineered Wooden Flooring and Ceramic Tiles.  The Avenue comprises of 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  3BHK Flat has a range of area from 3 Sq-ft to 4010 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has a range of area from 3 Sq-ft to 4596 Sq-ft having 2 and 4 balcony and 3, 4 and 5 bathroom.  Launched in July 2014, The Avenue offers Ongoing properties. The project is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC and ICICI. The major Amenities in the project are  Park. Lift. Arts & Craft Studio, Private Terrace/Garden, Private pool, Private jaccuzi, Mini Cinema Theatre, Pool with temperature control, High Ceiling and Large Clubhouse. .
about_project_details: Ezzy Group is a leading Property, Residential, and Construction group, specialising in high-end residential project development. The group is a world-class property development company focussed on delivering exceptional luxury real estate.Ezzy Group, established in 2011, caters to the luxury segments of the residential market with a range of product offerings including condominiums, row houses and apartments of varying sizes. Strongly positioned as an International Luxury Real Estate Brand, with years of expertise of construction and development in Dubai, our landmark projects in India are defined by superior quality, detail and perfection. The classic touch of the Ezzy brand stands out in every aspect of the properties we build - from beautiful facades to the flawless interiors created in collaboration with Ashai Design Corporation (ADC), an International architectural firm based in California, USA.

project_description: Arvind Expansia, the latest offering from Arvind SmartSpaces is a monument to design, freedom & space. Throughout life, we make promises. Promises made to a daughter, to a mother and to a wife. We at Arvind Expansia appreciate the importance of promises made and kept. We have made a commitment to keep our promises so you can keep yours. Arvind Expansia offers super premium 3,4 BHK apartments and 5 BHK villas in Whitefield Bangalore. With a vehicle free central open green space and a 6000 sq. ft. clubhouse for only 50 units, Arvind Expansia offers an unparalleled luxury experience to its residents.
about_project_details: Built on 80 years old legacy of the Lalbhai Group and established in year 2009, Arvind SmartSpaces Ltd. is committed to deliver a high quality experience to its customers. Were focused on creating real estate solutions that add value to lives. This reflects in the precision of our processes, the simplicity of our transactions and the thoughtfulness in everything we build. Were artisans who take great pride in the process of creation, for the joy it delivers.The company has the vision to create value for all the stake holders by redefining the standards of excellence and trust in the real estate industry. It is focused on creating real estate solutions that add value to life styles across categories.The company has established its presence in residential , commercial and land development space in a short period of time. Following the spectacular success of its projects and significant unmet demand, Arvind SmartSpaces has ambitious plans of coming up with other innovative offerings and mega projects in Ahmedabad and Bangalore catering to residential and commercial space.

project_description: Overview:Vasudha Springs is a project offering affordable homes in the fastest developing city of Bangalore. The project has been developed by the famous Vasudha Builders, Whitefield – Bangalore. Offering a freehold ownership for these ready to move in flats, the project has 92 well planned units built into a single huge tower. Project Details:Vasudha Springs apartments presents to you considerately built 2 and 3 BHK homes. The homes are priced from 39.9 Lac onwards making them pocket friendly. The Vasudha Springs floor plan ensures that you have well ventilated huge homes that will give you a steady supply of bright light throughout the day and will give you a healthy and peaceful life. The 2 BHK flats are spread over an area between 1120 sqft and 1290 sqft and the 3 BHK flats in Vasudha Springs are spread over an area between 1295 sqft and 1450 sqft.Vasudha Springs reviews approve of the state of the art amenities provided in the society along with the quality infrastructure and technically sound equipment used for construction. - These vaastu compliant homes have basic facilities such as swimming pool, kids play area, guarantee security service, gymnasium, fire fighting equipment, power back up, etc.- Other amenities include park, intercom facility, rainwater harvesting, internet, Wi-Fi connectivity, water storage, reserved parking space for residents, etc. Highpoints:The beautiful tracks for exercise – jogging, cycling and strolling and the operational club house are the main USPs of the project. These along with the close proximity to many schools, hospitals and shopping centres make Vasudha Springs, Bangalore worth considering. Public transport is also easily available for stress free commutation.For any more details regarding the project, you can check the updated Vasudha Springs photos and brochures. Make sure to book your dream home as soon as possible, as the numbers are limited.

project_description: Overview Sumadhura Soham Whitefield, Bangalore is a remarkable residential project by Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited. Sprawling across acres of verdant greenery this residential society offers 295 units distributed among 14 towers. The project offers a mix of 2, 2.5, 3 & 3.5-bedroom flats ranging between 1170-2000 sqft. The flat rates of Sumadhura Soham Whitefield are priced affordably to meet the necessities of every segment of home buyers. About the Project Conveniently located with all the facilities at your doorstep, this residential project is a best option if you are hunting for a luxuriant home at an unbeatable price. So, hurry up and a book a flat now in Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield, Bangalore. All these residential apartments have been designed with spacious floor plans which make them worth consideration. Blessed with plenty of fresh air & natural light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield invite you to live a blissful living. Breathe a new life and unwind yourself in the calm and peaceful surroundings of this marvellous residential haven. Sumadhura Shikharam Whitefield offers a pool of top-notch amenities like clubhouse, jogging & strolling tracks, gym, outdoor tennis courts, aerobics room, kids play area, etc. Highpoints Sumadhura Soham Whitefield offers seamless connectivity to a numerous IT companies like Accenture, Dell, TCS, L&T Infotech, and IGATE to name a few. Lots of national/international schools are situated within close vicinity such as Vibgyor High, The Deens Academy, Ryan International, Vydehi School of Excellence and Chrysils International. Whitefield is also famous for housing several popular malls like Cosmos Mall, Phoenix Market City, Forum Value and Inorbit Mall. Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, Satya Sai Medical Institute, Yashomati Hospital, Manipal Hospital and Sai Baba Hospital are some of the major healthcare facilities situated close by. Connectivity to public transport facilities is yet another highpoint of this neighbourhood.

project_description: Overview:MVS Builders Paradise is a residential project consisting of 48 units spanned over 1 tower. It is currently under construction and offering simply designed 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. The project is being developed by MVS Builders, with their 16 years of real estate experience and located in Whitefield, Bangalore. MVS Builders Paradise price rate starts from Rs. 18.8 Lac onward.Project Details:MVS Builders Paradise is offering aesthetically designed and spacious 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. It is being strategically built in the booming location of Whitefield, Bangalore. MVS Builders Paradise plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range from 570 sq. ft. to 590 sq. ft. and 2 BHK flat areas range from 740 sq. ft. to 1050 sq. ft. MVS Builders Paradise apartments are designed with a strong earthquake resistant frame structure and top notch interiors like anti skid and vitrified tiles flooring, attractive wooden doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, kitchen with stainless sink, designer bathroom and toilet etc. MVS Builders Paradise provides the residents with world class amenities like private terrace & garden, swimming pool, power back up, lift, 24*7 security facilities, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, recreation pool, private pool, multipurpose hall etc. and many more.Highpoints:MVS Builders Paradise is a luxurious residential project located in the prime area of Whitefield. It has all kinds of civic utilities and close connectivity to the rest of the city. MVS Builders Paradise locality is near Prestige White Meadows, Whitefield Global School and Forum Value Mall. Some of the utilities in the vicinity include White Field Post Office Bus Stop, Ryan International School, KIADB Shopping Complex, Railway Goods Loading Junction, Bank of India ATM, Reliance Fresh, Avenue Pharma, Bengaluru Marriott Hotel Whitefield, Hexa Innovation, Neolife Yoga Studio etc.

project_description: Overview Cynosure White Spaces Whitefield, Bangalore is one of the much-awaited residential venture undertaken by Cynosure Homez. The project covers an area of 1.5 acres and consists of 108 residential units sheltered within 2 towers. These units are a mixture of 2 and 3 BHK flats spanning across 866 – 1550 sqft. Cynosure White Spaces flat prices are listed within the moderate price bracket of Rs. 32.0 Lacs - 63.0 Lacs. Project details Cynosure White Spaces floor plans clearly show that the rooms are well-proportioned and are auspiciously built according to vaastu principles. The balconies are also well-placed and the windows are placed such that there is smooth passage for fresh winds and sunlight to every corner of the house. The built-up area of the 2 BHK flats varies from 866 sqft - 1000 sqft and cost within Rs. 32.9 Lacs - 38.0 Lacs. The 3-bedroom apartments are priced from Rs. 47.5 Lacs - 54.7 Lacs and measure within 866 - 1000 sqft. Cynosure White Spaces reviews are authentically positive, which makes these apartments a value-driven asset and are certainly not to be missed. The society is well-packed with a large group of premium amenities like: For sports lovers, there is a huge cricket stadium, basketball court, tennis court, skating rink and many more other sporting facilities.There is stunning swimming pool, which is apt for both the elite swimmers and fun seekers.The well-furnished lounge with upscale ambiance to hang out with your friends, colleagues, etc. Highpoints Well-placed just few kilometres away from ITPL, Phoenix Mall, Delhi Public School and some of the best medical facilities, Cynosure White Spaces location is the unique selling point of this residence. Easy public transport connectivity makes this locality a preferred one. To get a complete visual interpretation of the flats, browse through Cynosure White Spaces photos. Bookings are open so hurry up and make one of these flats your dream home!!!

project_description: OverviewMahaveer Promenade by the renowned Mahaveer Group presents 125 units spread across 2 towers. Available in 2-bedroom units, apartments in Mahaveer Promenade, Whitefield is well-ventilated abodes available in the price range of Rs.55.3 Lac to Rs. 62.1 Lac. The project features 11 floors and covering over 3.24 acres of prime space.Project DetailsMahaveer Promenade apartments are perfectly planned living spaces offering ample natural air and sunlight to create a refreshing aura. Mahaveer Promenade in Whitefield is a wonderfully created project featuring 11 floors matching international standards and modern demand. There are 2 BHK flats available in carpet area ranging between 1169 sqft to 1274 sqft having vitrified flooring across the rooms and balcony adorned with ceramic tiles while toilet has anti-skid ceramic tiles, main door teak wood frame with BST shutters, internal door features Sal wood frames with moulded/flush shutters, sanitary fittings and accessories in toilet are from top brands, fixtures and fittings used are premium quality from top-notch brands.These extravagantly designed residential apartments in Mahaveer Promenade, Whitefield are Vaastu compliant and offers a myriad of fascinating modern amenities like Club House, Jogging & Strolling Track, Cycling Track, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift Service, Security, Parking for both residents & visitors, Intercom Facility, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, Aerobics Room, Flower Gardens, Library And Business Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Multipurpose Courts and much more.HighpointsEach floor in Mahaveer Promenade boasts skilfully designed apartments with pioneering facilities to augment lifestyle of its residents. Mahaveer Promenade price is also reasonable considering the quality of living the project offers. Railway Goods Loading Junction is 5 KM, The Forum Value Mall is 2.4 KM and hospital like Vydehi Hospital Bus Stop is just 2.1 KM away from the residential project.

project_description: Overview Developed by Sumadhura Infracon Pvt. Ltd., Sumadhura Eden Garden is a new-launch residential project located in the prominent neighborhood of Whitefield, Bangalore. Sprawling across 14 acres of beautiful land, this brand new project features 22 majestic towers holding 1113 luxurious units. Designed to offer a premium lifestyle, this well-planned residence offers elegant 1, 2 & 3 BHK homes varying from 660 – 1523 sqft. Praised with good reviews, Sumadhura Eden Garden price list starts from the affordable price tag of Rs. 24 Lacs onwards. Project details Incredibly priced and brilliantly designed, Sumadhura Eden Garden showcases the true mastery of skilled craftsmanship that will definitely impress you. Sleek & beautiful, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Eden Garden situated in the sought-after residential address of Doddabanahalli, Whitefield, Bangalore are one of the best place to settle in with your family. Assuring a peaceful living, these light-filled abodes are creatively decorated with eye-pleasing interiors & exquisite exteriors. The pollution-free environment encircling this residence promote a healthy lifestyle with lots of positivity & divinity. All the basic facilities like 24hours water supply, power backup and round the clock security have been provided. Cricket pitch, barbeque, basket ball court, skating ring, tennis court, palm court, kids play area and a lavish swimming pool are some of the breathtaking features of this RERA certified residential project. Highpoints Without any doubt, the handpicked location is the main highpoint of Sumadhura Eden Garden located in Whitefield, Bangalore. Good proximity to various established IT companies of Whitefield and easy public transport connectivity make this region a best residential place. Ryan International School, Narayana Multispecialty Hospital and many more reputed schools & hospitals are situated within close proximity. Sumadhura Eden Garden Whitefield, Bangalore is definitely one of the most promising & ambitious project to invest your money. So, cash in and book now.

Shriram Properties 
Shriram Properties are a popular real estate developers & builders exuding fine dedication in building affordable housing & commercial properties across various localities in Chennai, Bangalore, Kolkata and Vizag. The company was established in 1990 and with an experience of over a decade, Shriram Properties aspires to construct projects to satiate needs of the modern lifestyle with world-class amenities. Till now, they have successfully executed 4.8 million sq. ft. of residential & 1.03 million sq. ft. of commercial projects. Shriram Properties in Bangalore is a renowned for their excellent commitment towards the customers, Shriram Properties has elevated its success to new heights. 
With an exceptional proven track record of completing major projects in Tier 1 & Tier 2 cities, Shriram Properties aims to establish their pan-India presence with a portfolio of construction projects comprising of modern integrated townships, residential apartments and commercial, hospitality, SEZs & retail. This construction company offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartment ranging between 44 Lakhs and 4.6 Crore. Today, they have partnered with Starwood Capital Group & Sun Apollo and Walton Street Capital for investments. 
Some of the projects by Shriram Properties that are worth mentioning are Shriram Greenfield in Bangalore, Shriram Smrithi in Bangalore, Shriram Sameeksha in Bangalore, Shriram Suhaana in Bangalore, Shriram Chirping Woods in Bangalore, Shriram Summit in Bangalore, Shriram Panorama Hills in Bangalore and much more.

project_description: Overview: NVR Sun Pearl is a residential project being developed by NVR Developers in the happening locality of Kadugodi, Bangalore offering aesthetically crafted and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project will consist of 144 units spread over 1 meticulously designed tower. NVR Sun Pearl price rate starts at Rs. 30 Lac onward.  Project Details:    NVR Sun Pearl, a project in the locality of Kadugodi, Bangalore is offering aesthetic and spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is being constructed by NVR Developers, with their 8 years of real estate experience. NVR Sun Pearl floor plans for its 2 BHK flat range from 910 sq. ft. to 1160 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1190 sq. ft. to 1375 sq. ft.NVR Sun Pearl Bangalore features modern day amenities for its residents like a club house, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, 24 hour security facility, reserved parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, children’s play area, rain water harvesting, and indoor squash & badminton courts etc. NVR Sun Pearl apartments are designed with good quality RCC frame structure for a strong and resistant foundation; interior specifications like powder coated aluminium frame windows, anti skid ceramic tiles in toilet and vitrified tiles flooring in every other room, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, good quality CP fittings and sanitary ware, teak wood frame main door and Sal wood frame internal door, concealed copper wiring with good quality switches, AC points, washing machine point, TV and telephone points, and quality fixtures etc. Highpoints:NVR Sun Pearl Bangalore locality has several basic utilities just a stone’s throw away including Sadaramangala Bus Stop, The Deen's Academy, Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, Canara Bank, More Super Market, Chaithanya Health Park, etc. and many more.
about_project_details: NVR Developers building and developing luxury and super luxury apartments in wide variety of price ranges, affordable to lower and middle income groups as well as the elite people group. All the projects built by us have the benchmark Quality, great aesthetic appeal with strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards.All our projects are certified by leading structural engineers We use the world-class building materials and partners with the best minds in the business. The interiors too with the excellent quality like elegant vitrified flooring, ceramic tiles, and powder-coated aluminum sliding windows are all standard in our projects.
