project_description: Overview:Umiya Woods is a project by Umiya Builders and Developers. It is located in Whitefield, Bengaluru consisting of 4 towers and 96 units, these pan over 1.30 acres with 2 and 3BHK apartments. Whitefield is an IT hub located in the eastern quadrant of Bengaluru, which makes this project location very strategic and have an inflow of global lifestyle and rapid urbanisation. Project Details :Umiya Woods located in Whitefield, Bangalore is a project developed by Umiya Builders and Developers. The projects have developed 2 and 3BHK flats for its residents. The flats are engineered with wooden flooring and vitrified tiling with ceramic tiles in the kitchen and utility areas. The main door has teak wood frame and panelled shutters with brass fittings.The project has various amenities including lifts, 24*7 power backup, fire fighting systems, intercom facility, car parking, gymnasium, club house and a separate area for kids to play. Other special amenities include swimming pool, multipurpose hall, toddler pool, steam room, yoga/meditation room, top notch security with 24*7 security personnel, gated community, video door security and Wi-Fi connectivity.The project has a large landscape garden surrounding for a green and luscious environment along with a paved compound. The beautiful landscape is consciously designed for a pleasant and an enjoyable living. A place where you enjoy a little longer with no qualms of the hassle outside.Highpoints:The location of this project is extremely high-key as it is surrounded by educational institutes, health care centres and essential civic utilities, which has favoured this project for a premium living space. Facilities such as schools (Ryan International), hospitals (Brookefield Hospital), utilities (Vydehi Institute of Medical Sciences and Research Centre), malls (Inorbit Mall) etc. are just mere examples of nearby facilities to this project. A haven in the hustle bustle of Bengaluru.
about_project_details: A vision to develop quality commercial, retail and residential properties inspired the setting up of Umiya in the year 2000 in Bangalore. After establishing itself in Bangalore for the first few years, Umiya expanded its footprint to Goa in 2007. Business is all about relationships. Ultimately - our most important relationship is with our customers. We strive to provide a one-stop solution for all our customers real estate needs, be it a home seeker, commercial clients or investors. We provide sales, leasing and property management services of a very high standard.UMIYAs portfolio reflects the aspirations of a broad range of home buyers encompassing apartments, luxury apartments, gated row villa communities and super luxurious independent villas. We have gained considerable experience in developing retail mall spaces at prime locations and office spaces for corporate offices, particularly the IT, ITES sector. We have constructed and constructing various properties that are recognized for their ideal locations and superior build quality. We continue to be one of the emerging player in the real estate development space. A dedicated team that is fuelled by a passion for quality and strives continuously to achieve customer delight stands behind the Umiya brand. We are on a journey and are confident that we will soon achieve our aim - to be the Builder of Choice in this rapidly growing sector and extremely competitive.

project_description: Located in Whitefield, Bangalore, Ozone Promenade by Ozone Group is an ongoing residential development boasting luxurious abodes loaded with all the top-notch amenities. Spread across 5.6acres of land parcel, this gorgeous project offers various 2, 2.5 and 3 BHK well-planned flats with varying area size from 1365 sqft to 2095 sqft. The project features total 549 residential units distributed among 8 towers. The flat rates of Ozone Promenade Whitefield, Bangalore are priced between Rs 85.85 Lacs – Rs. 1.31 Cr. Project details With possession by December-2019, Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments are designed with modern construction standards to provide extremely blissful living to its occupants. The impressive floor plans of of Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments will certainly impress you. Drawing lots of fresh air & light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield assure you a happy & healthy life. The apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield are also available for rent. This is a RERA certified residential project and is one of the best project to invest your money. Some of the exclusive amenities provided include swimming pool, club house, table-tennis, gym, jogging track, cricket, kid’s play area and much more. Highpoints Situated bang on Mahadevpura main road, Ozone Promenade Whitefield enjoys all the advantageous of a good location. Connectivity to public transport facilities and a proposed Namma Metro Station within just 130mts make this project sought-after. Well-known IT companies like TCS, Capgemini and Dell are situated within close vicinity. Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, VIBGYOR High School and St.Joseph's Convent School are found within just 4km radius. The popular Phoenix Mall is situated right opposite to this project.  If you have been looking for an ultimate luxurious residential destination for your family, then this project is the best option. So, cash in and book a flat now in Ozone Promenade Whitefield, Bangalore.

project_description: Overview: Sited in one of the best localities of Bangalore, Whitefield is known as an IT Hub. Having all the necessities at hand Urban Forest apartments, add verdant green to the hustle and bustle of Whitefield. Intellectually constructed by Alembic Real Estate, Urban Forest flats are spanning across over 4 sumptuous towers featuring 636 units, Urban Forest is priced in the range of Rs. 69.0 Lac 1.03 Cr. Every nook and corner of the flat has been designed to give you all the comforts of a modern lifestyle and the bliss of nature. About the project : The society is spanning across over 8.23 acre land, of which 2-acre has been dedicated for recreational amenities which will benefit the well being of the residents, 3-acre has been devoted for lush greenery which is clearly visible if you browse through Urban Forest photos. The apartments have excellent security system which ensures the society and its residents have peaceful nights and are secure. Each of these apartments are elegantly designed to give the residents all they have wished for with up to date civil work and good quality construction work. The Urban Forest floor plans include mixture of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK units, of which 2 BHK measures 1314 sq. ft., 3 BHKs are sized 1762 sq.ft. and 1890 sq.ft, the 4 BHK units measure 2628 sq.ft. and have all the necessities a family would require to live a comfortable lifestyle. Highpoints: Loaded with a pool of amenities, the project has all the advanced as well as basic recreational niceties which include an outdoor gym, tree houses, an amphitheatre, a shaded jogging track, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool, indoor squash and badminton courts to name a few. ITPL, Ujjwal Vidyalaya and proposed Metro Station and Columbia Asia Hospital are within close proximity. With remarkable Urban Forest reviews, grab this opportunity and book a flat now.

about_project_details: Sowparnika Projects and Infrastructure Pvt Ltd, since its inception in 2003, has grown into one of South Indias leading property developers in the Affordable Housing Segment. Headquartered in Bangalore, Sowparnika started with projects of mere 30,000 Sq.Ft. graduating to massive projects spanning over three million Sq. Ft. Achieving excellence in providing affordable housing, we have helped countless people realise their dreams of owning a house. At Sowparnika, we have systematically developed in-house expertise for competencies like architectural, QC and QS, plumbing, electrical, block work and fabrication activities and hence contributes to our success in achieving cost-effective construction. Currently, we have projects across several major cities in South India such as Bangalore, Mysore, Trivandrum, Chennai, Coimbatore, Tirupur, Changanassery and Guruvayur

project_description: Pavani Sarovar is located by the Nallurahalli Lake that site in the precincts of whitefield and the vicinity of ITPL. That is right in the middle of the It hub of Bangalore, Opt from the pleasure of cycling to work or the comfort of a bus ride to reach your workplace. While the rest of the world goes through the struggle og driving to work and spending more time on the road. So, here is a home that puts you right in the middle of where life has its own pace.Pavani Sarovar offers everything you have ever aspired for home. Come live the life.There are many pleasure can cherish, when your home is a place that is as vast and as magnificent as Pavani Sarovar. Because the joy of enjoying a picturesque view from the sire-out of your apartment is all yours. And yes, the greatest of all pleasure that place bestows you with, is the beautiful living experience.The towering building only adds to the beauty of the surrounding like a painting on the white canvas. While peace is a given that comes to you, pride, luxury and life with interesting neighbours is another sage that will became part of your living here. Get set for it all.A dream home is one that makes reality memorable every day of life. And your home at Pavani Sarovar will become much more than a dream home. With a great mix of minds, a pot-pourri of cultures and different genres of professions, there will be a lot to live for here.Get prepared to spend each day of your life here with a lot of enthusiasm, so much to joy, and so many ways to create the perfect picture for the album called life. Come find a life you have always wished you wanted to live.

This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI GROUP is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

project_description: Sai Nirmaanika Developers, yet again, introduces a luxury of different kind. Presenting SN FEN BREEZE, a new wave of envy in Bangalore! SN FEN BREEZE is not another luxury home. There's no luxury for luxury's sake! Everything is woven around the concept of harmonious living.SN FEN BREEZE is complete home, where luxury blends in perfectly with greenery. Not much, only 70 luxury apartments are waiting for your arrival in a close-knit community located in Whitefield, the IT Hub of Bangalore. In fact, close to ITPL, Whitefield Metro Station and Peripheral Ring Road.Vastu brings in harmony into living spaces and life of its residents. At SN FEN BREEZE, every home is designed as per vastu norms. Care is taken to ensure harmonious living with natural elements such as air, light and ventilation being in sync with living spaces. There's complete privacy.
about_project_details: The name 'Sai Nirmaanika' is significant with a deeper meaning. Nirmaanika in Sanskrit means construction / architectonic / architecture. Sai means saint / divine. As the name, so the work. At SN Developers every part of work is worship.The core team of SN Developers comprises highly qualified and vastly experienced professionals who bring an ocean of knowledge and expertise to the table. There is complete harmony between every thought and every action.Quality of work takes the centre stage at every juncture. There is no luxury or greenery for sake of it. Design is such that there is complete harmony between luxury and greenery to give not just high quality of living spaces, but also improve quality of living of our customers. The concern for environment is heart and soul of our all endeavors. Therefore we aim to provide lots of green spaces with pockets of water bodies in all our projects. Thereby, we wish to gift a cleaner, greener world for our future generations.Design-wise, our every project is contemporary, yet adheres strictly to Vastu principles. The name 'Sai Nirmaanika' is significant with a deeper meaning. Nirmaanika in Sanskrit means construction / architectonic / architecture. Sai means saint / divine. As the name, so the work. At SN Developers every part of work is worship.

The core team of SN Developers comprises highly qualified and vastly experienced professionals who bring an ocean of knowledge and expertise to the table. There is complete harmony between every thought and every action.

Quality of work takes the centre stage at every juncture. There is no luxury or greenery for sake of it. Design is such that there is complete harmony between luxury and greenery to give not just high quality of living spaces, but also improve quality of living of our customers. The concern for environment is heart and soul of our all endeavors. Therefore we aim to provide lots of green spaces with pockets of water bodies in all our projects. Thereby, we wish to gift a cleaner, greener world for our future generations.

Design-wise, our every project is contemporary, yet adheres strictly to Vastu principles. The organization is completely transparent in all its dealings, with complete orientation towards customer satisfaction.

Our vision
"To become one of the premier real estate developers in South India by building trustworthy relationships with our esteemed customers through trust, transparency and commitment."

Our Mission
"To provide our clients & customers with the kind of service that's unparalleled and envied by many in the industry. Also give them a kind of experience that's heart warming."

project_description: Overview Designed to offer international flavour of living Brigade Cosmopolis Whitefield is a global city in itself offering the residents with the choice of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments & penthouses spread across 12 blocks. The built up area of these premium units range from 116 - 373 sqm with the budgeted price starting from Rs. 90 Lac. The flats are up for sale and if required can also be rented out. About the Project The picturesque surroundings of this global township will soothe your mind and soul, ensuing a balanced a peaceful living. Experience a standard living by booking an affordable flat in Brigade Cosmopolis.The well-ventilated residential apartments of Brigade Cosmopolis are a dream place to have a pleasurable living experience. Spacious and splendidly appointed with high-end fittings & fixtures, these premium residential apartments will make you live a royal life with with your loved ones.Located in the posh locality of Whitefield, Bangalore – Brigade Cosmopolis enjoys good proximity to all the prime necessities essential for leading a comfortable life. Connectivity to public transports is added advantage of this township. Some of the famous and established workplace close by include Brigade Tech Park and ITPB.  Some of the well-known landmarks at an arm’s distance from this global city include the reputed The Brigade School, Greenwood High International School, Forum Value Mall, Phoenix Market City, Sri Sathya Sai Super Speciality Hospital, Four Points by Sheraton and the ravishing five-star hotel Marriot. Highpoints A luxurious 3,000 sqm clubhouse with a super-stylish rooftop swimming pool offering panoramic views of the city skyline is the star attraction of Brigade Cosmopolis Whitefield. Other key features of this global township include landscaped sky & terrace gardens, well-equipped badminton & basketball courts, a spectacular cricket pitch and many more.
about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus.Today, Brigade is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India and in Dubai. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.A reputation for innovation, quality and trust.We are known to be a professionally managed organisation with a stable and confident business model. We have shown an impressive compounded annual growth rate

Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus.

Today, Brigade is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India and in Dubai. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.A reputation for innovation, quality and trust.

We are known to be a professionally managed organisation with a stable and confident business model. We have shown an impressive compounded annual growth rate—even during difficult market and business cycles (like the depression of 1996, the post-9/11 shadow period and the present recession). And in the process of successfully negotiating changing conditions, Brigade has created a brand name that stands for trust, reliability and innovation, across all our domains.

project_description: Lifestyle finds yet another destination at Kumari Woods and Winds located at Whitefield, Bangalore sprawling across 2 acres. Kumari Woods and Winds consist of 120 units spread across 1 well-designed tower. These individual living spaces developed by Kumari Builders and Developers are available in 2 and 3 BHK configurations. Project details Kumari Woods and Winds provide a place to celebrate the lighter moments in life and a place to experience the true happiness. The 2 BHK apartments are spanning across 1070 to 1240 sqft whereas the 3 BHK apartments cover an area of 1350 to 1640 sqft. The price list of these apartments varies from 49.7 Lac to 75.1 Lac. Bank and legal approvals of Kumari Woods and Winds comprises of all leading banks, BBMP, BESCOM and BWSSB. The amenities in Kumari Woods And Winds comprises of landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gymnasium, play area, club house, car parking, jogging track, cricket court, basket ball court, senior citizen park, day care center, rock climbing, toddlers pool, skating rink, volley ball, security, yoga, etc. Spacious interiors, friendly budget and a sort after location add value to this project. Highpoints The address of Kumari Woods and Winds is a major plus point for buyers looking to invest in property in Bangalore. Whitefield is an important IT hub of Bangalore and is near to areas like Marathahalli and KR Puram. The locality is known for its good connectivity to the rest of the city, owing a house here will satisfy your housing needs. From health to nature to entertainment, it offers a complete package to satisfy everyone in your family. In short, Kumari Woods and Winds is the best value that you will get for your money. Book an apartment now and gift a deluxe home to your family.

project_description: Overview Skylark Ithaca in Whitefield, Bangalore is a superbly developed project from the prestigious real estate company Skylark Mansions. This one-of-a-kind project features 80% open space and 19 towers are dotted with almost 1900 units. Both apartments and penthouses are available for sale in the configuration of 1BHK, 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK units. About the Project Experience the joy of staying in your dream home at Skylark Ithaca situated in Whitefield, Bangalore, right in the nerve center of IT hub. The residential apartments in this project are reasonable priced with rates varying between Rs.27.2lakhs to 2.15crore. 1BHK apartments are available in the size of ranging from 592sq.ft. to 624sq.ft. while 2BHK apartments can be found in the sizes varying between 999sq.ft. to 1268sq.ft. 3BHK well ventilated residential apartments are available in sizes ranging between 1472sq.ft. to 1987sq.ft. while 4BHK units are sized at 2375sq.ft. to 3060sq.ft. With homes being offered at a price as low as Rs.27.2lakhs, one can be assured of getting an excellent opportunity of investing a home that is truly worth every penny. So, make the best of this opportunity by booking your flat now in this prestigious project.

project_description: NVT Life Square is a fresh experience in villa-living at a community that has been designed to give you double the life and double the living. Its a home thats a reflection of thoughtful design, meticulous planning and obsession to quality of workmanship.Every villa is designed with two access points, one in the front and the other in the rear. The front formal entry has tree-lined in organic pattern and colorful pavers laid on beautiful pathways. The gorgeous living spaces with high ceilings and skylights converge to the informal rear side which opens to the large green spaces with viewing deck, balconies and terraces where one can interact, socialize, relax and lead the community life.
about_project_details: NVT Quality Lifestyle is a professionally managed real estate company dedicated to developing high-end residential and commercial projects. The company is part of the NVT Group established in 1995.NVT Group is run by professionals who are alumni from IIT, Carnegie Mellon, Purdue and Wharton. The group comprises of diverse set of businesses in area of Quality Certification, Consulting, Education and Training and Infrastructure Development.The other group companies include:NVT Quality Certification: A pioneer in Quality Certification with business partnerships in the Netherlands and USA, offering services across India, South East Asia and Middle East.International School of Management Excellence: One of the leading business schools in Bangalore and a candidate institute with the University of London, UK to offer their courses.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Located in heart of Whitefield and close to the hub of activities with vicinity to top educational institutions, convenience stores, supermarkets, malls, world-class healthcare, entertainment centers and much more.Project USPUniquely designed dual access villas ensuring abundance of Natural Light and Ventilation.Master plan based on scientific study of airflow and heat design including driveways design based on traffic pattern studies with patterned pavers for walking and driving lanes.Low Housing Footprint Design with maximum use of natural elements and vehicular free large green spaces interspersed with amenities for all ages that includes fitness zones, leisure zones, rejuvenation zone and kids play zones.Flow through design of the villas with high span of ceiling with wider horizons and magnificent skylight and spacious open kitchen for convenience and style.Large floor area with generous sized rooms having Living, Dining, Kitchen.Bedrooms that include Guest Bedroom, Children Bedroom, Master Bedroom, Parents Bedroom, Deck overlooking the landscaped area, Gym, Family, Office Space, Activities Room, Balconies and Terraces.Private Courtyard and Balcony spaces overlooking the natures mesmerizing surroundings with green open spaces. Best in Class Specifications like Italian marble flooring polished for mirror finish, Windows imported from Germany that are designed for Reduced Heat, Optimal Light and Airflow and all materials sourced from most reputed manufacturers.Best construction processes implemented that include 8 stages of waterproofing, 8 coats of polishing of marble, seven processes of surface treatment, monitored curing process, use of specialized plaster with river sand for plastering and strongly monitored QC systems.Designed to ensure maximum water and energy conservation. Rain water collection tank, water harvesting management systems and sewage management systems using latest technologies for reusing and recycling of water. Energy efficient common lighting systems and robust power back up.



Discussion

project_description: Lead Developers presents Lead Grandeur, one of the residential projects in Whitefield, Bangalore. It will offer 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments with amenities such as 24 hour power back up, play area, swimming pool, gymnasium, indoor games, terrace club house, terrace party area, multipurpose hall and security. It is in closer proximity to Kadugodi Junction, Whitefield Railway Station and Sai Baba Ashram.SRS White Pearl located in TC Palya, Bengaluru, a project by SRS Shelters Builders offering luxurious possession within 6 months 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SRS White pearl apartments are designed with a RCC framed structure, teak wood main doors, vitrified floorings for living, kitchen, bedroom and balconies, ceramic tiling in toilets, granite kitchen counter top, concealed copper wiring, etc.SRS White pearl has provided many essential facilities for its residents like lifts, 24x7 water supply, 24x7 power back up, intercom, car parking, gym, club house, childrens play area, swimming pool and other lifestyle amenities like community hall, and eco-friendly facilities like rain water harvesting.BDA approved, and designing of the homes ensures utmost privacy to every section of the house. Large windows keep the rooms well-ventilated at any time of the day. The project has been crafted in a manner to amaze you with all the facilities. Halehalli, KR Puram has gained prominence in recent years as a mid-point between East Bangalore and the East Business Districts. The main connecting link which has worked for KR Puram is the NH-4, which links the locality with Airport road and Bangalore city.KR Puram is also well-connected to the Bengaluru International Airport on one end and Varthur on another, via ORR. The locality is also close to important economic centres of Bellandur, Sarjapur Road and Whitefield.

It has 525 Units of 2 Towers offering a wide range of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments.Project Details:BM Magnolia Park is poised to be one of the most attractive residential gated societies in   India. It has 2 towers, Cedar and Aspen built on 5 acres of landscaped area, so that your family can live in an open environment. The project offers 2 BHK apartments with many range options of 1080 sqft, 1155 sqft, 1175 sqft, 1185 sqft, 1190 sqft, 1215 sqft, 1220 sqft,1225 sqft, 1230 sqft, 1235 sqft, 1240 sqft, 1250 sqft, 1260 sqft, 1270 sqft, 1275 sqft, 1280 sqft, 1285 sqft, 1290 sqft, 1300 sqft, 1305 sqft, 1320 sqft, 1325 sqft, 1350 sqft, 1385 sqft, 1410 sqft and 3 BHK apartments range from 1450 sqft, 1455 sqft, 1480 sqft, 1515 sqft, 1570 sqft, 1590 sqft, 1620 sqft, 1920 sqft etc. BM Magnolia Park is a RERA Certified Project. Book with us today to fulfil your desire of a dream home.Highpoints: The project is 200 Meters from proposed 270 feet Peripheral Ring Road (PRR) Whitefield, Bangalore which is 3 KM from Proposed Metro rail station and also Whitefield railway station. about_project_details: At BM Dvelopers, we create comfortable, well-planned urban spaces for both residential and commercial purposes. As one of the foremost builders in Bangalore, our team of professionals ensure that your property is among the best of real estate in Bangalore. Founded by Mr. Gajendra Naidu in the year of 1996, BM Developers brings alive the creativity, integrity and versatility encompassed within each of its projects, with the sole aim of providing superior contemporary living spaces envisioned with a traditional approach, to bring every customer close to nature. Our customer-centric approach focuses on creating harmonious energy and positivity for quality living and lasting relationships with our customers.With an experience over 20 project in past 8 years. Has proven track record on deliver, quality and timeline. Currently we have over 8 ongoing project ranging from 20.5 lakhs onwards. Project are spread across South and East Bangalore.

project_description: OverviewBrigade Lakefront by the Brigade Group is a gated community of charming lakefront of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments at an affordable price starting from Rs.77lakh onwards. With a super built up area varying between 109 to 312sq.m., these homes offer a seamless blend of serenity, bliss, utmost luxury & comfort.  About the ProjectBrigade Group has been instrumental in developing some of the finest edifices in the country and their ethos of building yet another residential landmark is evident in Brigade Lakefront, a spectacular residential development in the heart of Whitefield, Bangalore.  These well-ventilated residential apartments are available in the configuration of 2, 3 and 4BHK units in the size ranging between 124 and 312 square meters. Each apartment is meticulously designed offering thoughtfully designed layouts and spacious living spaces. The flat rates in Brigade Lakefront range between Rs.73 lakhs to Rs.2.20crore. Adding to the charm of these gracefully designed residences are an exclusive array of amenities for the residents to enjoy and experience a holistic lifestyle. 2,787 square meter of space has been reserved for leisure and recreational facilities such as a rooftop swimming pool, children’s play area, mini theatre, tennis court, basketball court, cricket pitch, senior citizen court & large open green spaces. Brigade Lakefront is suitably positioned in terms of location too, as it enjoys proximity to various social infrastructural facilities. Areas such as EPIP Zone, ITPL & Brookefields are easily accessible within a short distance of 3 to 4km. Malls, hospitals & schools are also situated within easy reach of Brigade Lakefront. HighpointsWhat sets Brigade Lakefront apart is the amount of open space residents get to enjoy. Spacious interiors combined with vast open spaces help one to rejuvenate & revive amid natural greens despite being situated in the heart of the city. To breathe in fresh air every morning, book a flat in this project offering premium lifestyle & plenty of lung space.

Brigade Group 
Brigade Group is one of the South India's prominent real estate companies which was established in 1986 and is headquartered in Bangalore. With over 3 decades of incredible experience in the field, Brigade Group presents expertise multiple segments like property development & management services, hospitality and education. The group is involved in the development of luxury apartments in Bangalore and 1 bhk, 2bhk, 3bhk, 4bhk Residential Flats/ Apartments spanning an area starting from 900 sqft at prices ranging from 65L – 2.8 Cr and more. They are involved in construction of Commercial Buildings, Housing Complexes, IT Hubs, Hospitals and much more with its core area of construction being all the major cities in South India i.e. Chennai, Hyderabad, Chikmagalur, Mangalore, Mysore and Kochi. 
Delivering exceptional projects under the supervision of Mr. P.V. Maiya who is the independent Director of the Brigade Group, it has branch offices in several cities of South India. Proudly carrying a status for revolution, excellence and faith, the group is known for setting a steady and poised business model. Some of the project undertaken by Brigade Group are Brigade Mayfair in Bangalore, Brigade Coronet in Bangalore, Millennium Cassia in Bangalore, Brigade Summit on Bangalore, World Trade Center in Bangalore, Komarla Brigade Residency in Bangalore, Brigade Laguna in Bangalore, Brigade Hill View in Bangalore and much more.

project_description: Positioned on Whitefield-Sarjapur Road, Prestige Lakeside Habitat is a luxury residential building spread over 102 acres. This project by Prestige group consists of 3426 luxury apartments with 271 villas having their own private gardens. Nothing be more satisfying than owning your house in such a wonderful location. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat, Whitfield is specially designed around the Disney theme to present you the exquisite habitat in Bangalore at affordable prices. From striking flooring to the kitchen with high-quality tiles, spacious rooms and what not makes this an ideal apartment in Bangalore. Each and every little detail has been carefully designed for you to experience a luxurious lifestyle. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Luxurious Apartments choice in the Varthur of Whitefield that is encircled with a stunning & magical atmosphere. Enjoy calm living at a home which is away from the chaos and full of serenity. The luxurious development of Prestige Lakeside Habitat offers exceptional chances to relive the relaxed and easy-going lifestyle without giving up the pleasures of urban life. The project is estimated to be completed by May 2018, let’s have a look at the details of this habitat.Project DetailsThe Prestige Lakeside Habitat features with amenities like Intercom, Indoor Games, Aerobics & Meditation Room, Play Area, Swimming Pool, Yoga, Landscaped Garden, Tennis Court, Health Facilities, Gymnasium, Basket Ball Court, Badminton Court, Club House and excellent Security. This project is the result of development through premium quality raw materials. There are 80 acres of open space available that allows you to breathe in fresh & pollution free air. It is also close to many corporate giants such as Wipro, HLL, ITPL, etc. Price range and unit details, the project covers an area of around 1195 to 4934 sqft per unit and consist of 3697 units build across 24 towers. The 2 BHK flats are available in area range of 1195-1346 sqft per unit and price range start from around 61 lacs. The 3 BHK flats and villas are available at a price range starting from approximately 2.5 cr. and 4 BHK flats are available in price range starting from approximately 1.5 cr. You can consider these price range and unit details prior to investing in the property.Highpoints: Why buy Prestige Lakeside Habitat? The price of Prestige Lake Side Habitat, Bangalore is reasonable for those looking for both luxurious & affordable Villas in Whitfield. Also, the project enjoys the location advantage of being the nearby location to many colleges, schools, recreational areas, hospitals, parks and other facilities close to Varthur. Many international schools are situated within 2-3 km and Hospitals like Sai Baba Hospital and Vydehi Hospitals are also quite close to it.

project_description: Overview RERA certified, Prestige Boulevard located in Whitefield, Bangalore is developed by the renowned Prestige Group. The project spans across 3-acres and features 9 grand towers that hold 144 units. The project comprises of 2 and 3 BHK flats and builder floor apartments ranging from 1044, 1640 sqft. Prestige Boulevard flat prices vary from Rs. 51.0 Lacs  1.06 Cr and for further details, browse through Prestige Boulevard photos and brochure. About the project          Have a glimpse at the flexible payment plans and floor plans of Prestige Boulevard and know why this project is so popular and worthwhile. The project is still-under construction and slated possession date is December 2019. Both the flats and builder floor apartments will be offered with freehold ownership, which make them a profitable investment asset. Available for both resale and rent, Prestige Boulevard apartments assure great and wonderful living spaces that will simply amaze you. The 2 BHK builder floor apartments are spread across 1044, 1064 sqft while the 2 BHK flats vary from 1043, 1068 sqft. Similarly, the 3 BHK builder floor apartments range from 1585, 1636 sqft and the 3 BHK flats measure within 1584, 1640 sqft. Well-constructed to meet all the needs of modern age buyers, this project is conceptualized with sheer elegance and is armed with an abundance pool of modern amenities. These apartments are well-aligned for sufficient natural light and excellent cross ventilation. Highpoints A series of high-end amenities like club house, swimming pool, gym, kids play area and various sports facilities is the exclusive feature of this residential enclave. Reliable connectivity to workplaces of ITPL and MG Road via good public transport connectivity is an added advantage, which make this area a preferred residential destination. For a jubilant, comfortable and convenient lifestyle with your family, book a flat now in Prestige Boulevard located in Whitefield, Bangalore
